    • Method Detail

      • login

        public UserInfo login(UserLogIn user)
        Checks the database for the user's passed in credentials, returning the user information if the credentials are verified (username + password is a valid user).
        Parameters:
        user - UserLogIn information
        Returns:
        If user credentials are verified, returns UserInfo with user information, else returns without the user information.

      • addUser

        public StandardReturnObject addUser(UserSignUp user)
        Signs the user up to use the system. User information must be provided, including username, first name, last name, etc.
        Parameters:
        user - UserSignUp information
        Returns:
        StandardReturnObject with success/error message, depending on if there was an error

      • submitEnrichmentRequest

        public StandardReturnObject submitEnrichmentRequest(CompleteRequestForm form)
        Adds the enrichment request information to the database.
        Parameters:
        form - CompleteRequestForm - enrichment request form information
        Returns:
        StandardReturnObject with success/error message depending on if there was an error
